mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_NO, USER_ID, TOTAL_ORDER_PRICE, ORDER_DATE, SHOPPING_ADDRESS, SHOPPING_POSTCODE, SHOPPING_DETAILADDRESS, SHOPPING_EXTRAADDRESS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, ORDER_NO, USER_ID, TOTAL_ORDER_PRICE, ORDER_DATE, SHOPPING_ADDRESS, SHOPPING_POSTCODE, SHOPPING_DETAILADDRESS, SHOPPING_EXTRAADDRESS FROM (SELECT ORDER_NO, NVL(USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(TOTAL_ORDER_PRICE, 0) AS TOTAL_ORDER_PRICE, NVL(TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '') AS ORDER_DATE, NVL(SHOPPING_ADDRESS, '') AS SHOPPING_ADDRESS, NVL(SHOPPING_POSTCODE, 0) AS SHOPPING_POSTCODE, NVL(SHOPPING_DETAILADDRESS, '') AS SHOPPING_DETAILADDRESS, NVL(SHOPPING_EXTRAADDRESS, '') AS SHOPPING_EXTRAADDRESS FROM TBL_ORDER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY ORDER_NO DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT ORDER_DETAIL_NO, NVL(ORDER_NO, 0) AS ORDER_NO, NVL(PRODUCT_NO, 0) AS PRODUCT_NO, NVL(PRODUCT_NAME, '') AS PRODUCT_NAME, NVL(ORDER_COUNT, 0) AS ORDER_COUNT, NVL(PRODUCT_PRICE, 0) AS PRODUCT_PRICE, NVL(SIZE_NAME, '') AS SIZE_NAME, NVL(DISCOUNT_PRICE, 0) AS DISCOUNT_PRICE, NVL(TOTAL_PRICE, 0) AS TOTAL_PRICE FROM TBL_ORDER_DETAIL WHERE ORDER_NO = #{value}

SELECT ORDER_NO, NVL(USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(TOTAL_ORDER_PRICE, 0) AS TOTAL_ORDER_PRICE, NVL(TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '') AS ORDER_DATE, NVL(SHOPPING_ADDRESS, '') AS SHOPPING_ADDRESS, NVL(SHOPPING_POSTCODE, 0) AS SHOPPING_POSTCODE, NVL(SHOPPING_DETAILADDRESS, '') AS SHOPPING_DETAILADDRESS, NVL(SHOPPING_EXTRAADDRESS, '') AS SHOPPING_EXTRAADDRESS FROM TBL_ORDER WHERE ORDER_NO = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ORDER ( ORDER_NO, USER_ID, TOTAL_ORDER_PRICE, ORDER_DATE, SHOPPING_ADDRESS, SHOPPING_POSTCODE, SHOPPING_DETAILADDRESS, SHOPPING_EXTRAADDRESS ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, #{userId}, #{totalOrderPrice}, SYSDATE, #{shoppingAddress}, #{shoppingPostcode}, #{shoppingDetailAddress}, #{shoppingExtraAddress} )

SELECT TEST_TBL_ORDER_DETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_ORDER_DETAIL ( ORDER_DETAIL_NO, ORDER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, ORDER_COUNT, PRODUCT_PRICE, SIZE_NAME, DISCOUNT_PRICE, TOTAL_PRICE ) VALUES ( #{orderDetailNo}, #{orderNo}, #{productNo}, #{productName}, #{orderCount}, #{productPrice}, #{sizeName}, #{discountPrice}, #{totalPrice} )
